message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.MM, cs.SY, cs.EM 

The paper discusses the use of artificial thin films of electromagnetic and reconfigurable material to create smart radio environments, which involves the integration of communication, sensing, and computing. This topic is closely related to information theory (cs.IT) and networked systems (cs.NI), as well as multimedia (cs.MM), control systems (cs.SY), and electromagnetics (cs.EM).
